name: figjenda
description: A widget combining a meeting agenda and an interval timer.

scripts.zip: mkdir -p out && npm run build && zip -r out/create-widget-app.zip . -x node_modules/\* -x plugin-typings/node_modules/\* -x .\* -x out/\* -x plugin-typings/*.zip plugin-typings/.\*
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run build
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:main && npm run typecheck:ui
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:main
scripts.build:production: npm run build:ui && npm run build:main -- --minify

author: Figma
